page.title: 18Mrs B.A Newcomer To The Area
page.content: Mrs B. is new to the area.She was born in London and lived there until 1980, then she moved with her husband and daughter to St Ives and in Jan.1985 to Needingworth.She made the move to buy an affordable house and wanted her child to be brought up in the country. Mrs B. trained as a nursery nurse and now works at the local school.In her spare time she likes to read or do some gardening. She thinks London has changed for the worst and is now more threatening what with traffic and hooliganism.However, women have more freedom of choice and most people have enough money.She uses local shops weekdays but her father drives her to Cambridge on Saturdays. Mrs B.'s parents moved to the village three years ago.For the future, she just wishes for her and her family to have a happy life.
